product_description: Discover the exceptional quality of Lululemon Align High-Rise Pant by Lululemon. Designed for Women with premium Nulu fabric, 81% Nylon and 19% Lycra elastane, this Activewear offers both style and functionality. Perfect for All Season use and available in Black, Navy, Dark Olive, Cayenne and White, it's a versatile addition to enhance your personal collection.
